Activity: Wake up and check emails, maybe look at some game design articles to get inspiration.
Prepare the documentation for the detailed character models for the first enemy type, make sure to outline every aspect needed.
Start working on the detailed character models for the first enemy type. Focus on high-quality textures and intricate details.
Continue refining the character model, paying close attention to the silhouette and overall proportions. Time to bring this enemy to life!
Ask @cdev-1 for a review of the enemy model to see if there is anything that needs to be changed.
Wrap up, review progress, and head home. Feeling good about the enemy model!
